name: Piranha Escape (bitmagine Studio)
description:
Help the Piranha to escape from dark mater in this fun, challenging, colorful and very very addictive game.

One of the best time killer games.
Try to hit a new high score!

MAIN FEATURES:

  • The classic game with new mechanics.
  • Easy 2 fingers control.
  • Amazing and colorful graphics.
  • Change the skin of the Piranha.
  • Choice various visuals filters.
  • No Internet connection required.
  • Infinite and relaxing game.
  • Developed from scratch (code and graphics) in 3 weeks by only one person (me).

CONTROLS:

  • Z or tap left side of screen to swim up.
  • X or tap right side of screen to swim forward.
